ai-tha-ap455:1.4_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
ai-tha-ap455:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap455:2.4_0: This is the fruit of the seed.
ai-tha-ap455:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap455:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap455:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
ai-tha-ap455:7.1_0: They were glad and senior by Sīha.
